predicate.note: Frames file for 'counterbalance' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to oppose with an equal force

example.name: transitive
example.text: In 1987 , the San Francisco district court dismissed the case largely because newspaper reports had sufficiently counterbalanced the company 's statements by [*] alerting consumers to Lisa 's problems .
example.arg: by [*] alerting consumers to Lisa 's problems
